assessments.status_rationale: The August 2025 CPI report is scheduled for 2025-09-11; no release or leak is cited in today’s news.
No confirmed close for the 5-Year Treasury yield at or below 3.95% is reported; the deadline is 2025-09-30.
No OPEC+ post-meeting communiqué or production target decision is referenced; the cutoff is 2025-09-09.
The performance window (2025-09-06 to 2025-09-27) is ongoing and no comparative price data is provided.
No OFAC actions targeting Brazilian persons or entities are mentioned; the deadline is 2025-10-15.
Today’s coverage does not report WTI front-month settling at or above $92.50; the window remains open until 2025-10-15.
No report of Alphabet filing an appeal of the EC’s €2.95B ad tech fine; only broader EU–US trade tensions are noted. Deadline is 2025-10-31.
